name: Skanergy Srl
goal:
We develope a new Bio technique to eliminate Varroa Mites from bees.
We projected and now commercialize first thermal treatment which kill 80% of Varroa inside the comb.
This year we have lounched the next version whitout cables and the beekeepers are happy to get functioning like this
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
We got from the region in Italy some grant about European roule n.1308/2013, in Italy 7 region started to give some grant to the beekeepers this years and we would like to extend in all of Europe this Bio technique.
We also are waiting for Horizon 2020 ressults
